name: Lotus Esprit Turbo Challenge
description:
Feel the thrill of accelerating form 0 to 60 in 4.7 seconds as you race head to head over hills, through valleys and around vicious bends gripping the wheel of your Lotus Esprit Turbo.

Game features include:
- 3D split screen 1 or 2 player action
- 32 courses across 3 different levels
- 20 competing cars
- Multi-hazard turbo racing
- Refuelling and pitstop decision tactics
